item.description:
@ZA_H wrote:

Hey guys i need help with this.
Im trying to make it where you can continuously keep attacking the dummy
and getting xp like every 5 seconds

case 823: { sendMessage("You Attack The Dummy."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[2]), 2); actionTimer = 5; } break;

yeah i know im doing something wrong.
So how i fix this?
